full_summary:
=============== ### [Erosion Control Tender Announcement](#erosion-control-tender-announcement) #### Overview The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a competitive, selective tendering process for the **Phase 2 EZ899-240832 Alaska Highway Km 660 Toad River Erosion Protection** contract. #### Tender Details | Category | Details | | --- | --- | | **Contract Title (State and French)** |
  • English: Phase 2 EZ899-240832 Alaska Highway Km 660 Toad River Erosion Protection
  • French: Phase 2 EZ899-240832 Protection contre l’érosion de la rivière Toad au km 660 de la route de l’Alaska
| | **Reference Number** | WS4234577987-Doc4269441280 | | **Solicitation Number** | WS4234577987 | | **Publication Date** | 20 October 2023 | | **Tender Closing Date** | 22 November 2023, at 14:00:00 | | **Amendment Date** | 14 November 2023 | | **Expected Contract Term** | 01 March 2024 | #### Services Requirements The contract encompasses various services, including: * Dredging * Rock removal * Environmental protection * Earthworks engineering #### Procurement Method This tender process employs competitive, selective tendering. #### Selection Criteria Bids will be evaluated based on the **lowest price** criterion. #### Contact Information To obtain more information, please contact: * **Serdar Eskicakit** (PSPC/SPAC) * Email: serdar.eskicakit@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca * Phone: None * Fax: None Note: The rewritten output is in markdown format and includes a heading and subheadings to improve readability. I condensed the provided data while preserving the essential information. The sections are structured to follow a logical flow, making it easier for readers to comprehend the content. Let me know if you have any further requests! I'm here to assist you.
